code: export var getCookie=function getCookie(cookieName){var value=document.cookie.split(';').filter(function(item){return item.includes(cookieName);})[0];if(value!==undefined){value=value.split('=')[1];}return value;};export var setCookie=function setCookie(cookiName,value,options){document.cookie="".concat(cookiName,"=").concat(value,";").concat(getOptions(options));};var getOptions=function getOptions(options){var optionValues='';if(options&&!!options.maxAge){var date=new Date();date.setTime(date.getTime()+options.maxAge*24*60*60*1000);optionValues="expires=".concat(date.toUTCString());}optionValues+="path=".concat(options&&!!options.path?options.path:'/');return optionValues;};export var deleteCookie=function deleteCookie(cookieName){document.cookie="".concat(cookieName,"=; expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 UTC; path=/;");};
